about us

We are the youth of today and we have united to establish the “Life&peace” charitable foundation, currently based in Warsaw, Poland. Our aspiration is to make the world a better place with you on our side! Our goal is to reinstate people’s belief in simple, genuine human relationships.

  • 130 Volunteers
  • 15k People received assistance
  • 3k Kg of humanitarian aid sent

Project

Our aspiration is to make the world a better place with you on our side!

donate

The main area of our work is to provide people who suffer from serious medical conditions with the rehabilitation they need, to improve the living standards of those people who are currently facing difficult life conditions, and especially to support those ones who suffered from the consequences of Russian aggression.

Izabella Volunteer
